title: Le Petit Lapin et les Carottes
description: Un lapin apprend à partager et à compter les légumes

paragraphs.french: Pierre est un petit lapin blanc. Il habite dans un grand jardin.
paragraphs.english: Pierre is a little white rabbit. He lives in a big garden.

paragraphs.french: Aujourd'hui, Pierre a trouvé dix carottes oranges. Elles sont très belles!
paragraphs.english: Today, Pierre found ten orange carrots. They are very beautiful!

paragraphs.french: Pierre est gourmand. Il veut manger toutes les carottes.
paragraphs.english: Pierre is greedy. He wants to eat all the carrots.

paragraphs.french: Soudain, son amie Sophie arrive. Sophie est un lapin gris.
paragraphs.english: Suddenly, his friend Sophie arrives. Sophie is a gray rabbit.

paragraphs.french: Sophie dit: «Bonjour Pierre! Tu as beaucoup de carottes!»
paragraphs.english: Sophie says: 'Hello Pierre! You have many carrots!'

paragraphs.french: Pierre pense. Il veut être gentil. Il décide de partager.
paragraphs.english: Pierre thinks. He wants to be kind. He decides to share.

paragraphs.french: «Je te donne cinq carottes», dit Pierre. «Maintenant, nous avons cinq carottes chacun.»
paragraphs.english: 'I'll give you five carrots,' says Pierre. 'Now we each have five carrots.'

paragraphs.french: Sophie est très contente. «Merci, Pierre! Tu es un bon ami!»
paragraphs.english: Sophie is very happy. 'Thank you, Pierre! You are a good friend!'

paragraphs.french: Les deux lapins comptent leurs carottes ensemble: un, deux, trois, quatre, cinq!
paragraphs.english: The two rabbits count their carrots together: one, two, three, four, five!

paragraphs.french: Pierre a appris quelque chose d'important: partager rend heureux!
paragraphs.english: Pierre learned something important: sharing makes you happy!
